meanings.definition: A person who abates or diminishes something.
meanings.sent1: The abators worked together to reduce pollution in the city.
meanings.sent2: We need more abators like him to help protect the environment.
meanings.sent3: The abators decided to team up and make the world a cleaner place.
meanings.sent4: She was like an abator of negativity, always finding ways to make things better.
meanings.sent5: The abators were like superheroes, swooping in to save the day from harm.
